channel.title: Schedule on Core Interaction Spring 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Schedule on Core Interaction Spring 2022

item.title: Week 1
item.description: WEEK 1 (REMOTE) Tue 1/25 Studio IN CLASS Introductions (Sophie and Eric) Fill out the Questionnaire Group Agreement Review Syllabus Intro: Reading assignments sign up Begin Unit 1: Intx with the Internet Exercise: Slack Avatar AFTER CLASS READ + WATCH Cyberspace Origins (lecture) & Internet Today (lecture) on vimeo, check Slack for the password Olia Lialina (reading) Everyone writes a discussion comment or question here. Reading leaders, please connect the readings to the two lectures and prepare comments and questions around this.

item.title: Week 2
item.description: WEEK 2 (REMOTE) Tue 2/1 Studio In Class Discuss lectures + readings. Hannah is our discussion leader. Figma workspace and tips Review What’s the point of critique Small group meetings to discuss project ideas in groups of 3 (10 min per person) Back together as a class: share feedback summary ambient work time (P1: Part 2) After Class P1: Part 2 Thu 2/3 Studio In Class One-on-ones: Implementation Exercise: [Screen Time] (https://docs.

item.title: Week 3
item.description: WEEK 3 Tue 2/8 Studio In Class P1: Final crit with Sophie & Eric Last person who presented is first to speak about next presenterâ€™s work After Class READ Loretta Staples American Artist Frank Chimero WATCH Digital Typography and Language in User Interfaces Bias within Design Systems Thu 2/10 Studio In Class Discuss lectures + readings Introduce Project 2: Stories as Networks Exercise: Type & Interaction Study in pairs After Class P2: PART 1 Fri 2/11 Lab In Class LECTURE

item.title: Week 4
item.description: WEEK 4 Tue 2/15 Studio In Class After Class Thu 2/17 Studio In Class After Class Fri 2/18 Lab In Class After Class
